title: A Thousand Miles from Nowhere: A Hippy Trip of Discovery
description: When Saffron embarks on a road trip in the 1980s, her mission is to blot out the pain of a devastating love affair. A journey of experimentation and passion awaits her in Spain. On this voyage of hedonism and excitement, Saffron embarks on a series of affairs and dangerous relationships.As Saffron hurtles from moments of darkness and drug-induced insanity to laughter and comical encounters, will she discover one can never escape from oneself?
author: SAFFRON MELLO CASTRO
